title: DAY 8 - LIVE ACCOUNTS VS PROP FIRM
description: Comparing live trading accounts with proprietary firm accounts and understanding risk management.
content:
In this lesson, you'll learn:

• What proprietary firms provide
• Evaluation phases and requirements
• Risk in live accounts (personal capital)
• Drawdown rules and limits
• Strict risk control necessity
• Discipline requirements for prop trading

quiz.question: Prop firms provide:
quiz.explanation: Proprietary firms provide traders with funded capital to trade with, sharing profits accordingly.

quiz.question: Evaluation phase tests:
quiz.explanation: Evaluation phases assess whether you can follow rules and demonstrate disciplined trading.

quiz.question: Live account risk is:
quiz.explanation: Live account trading risks your own real money, unlike demo trading.

quiz.question: Drawdown rules are:
quiz.explanation: Drawdown rules define maximum acceptable losses before account suspension.

quiz.question: Prop trading requires:
quiz.explanation: Proprietary trading demands rigorous adherence to risk management rules to preserve capital.
